Jobsrepublic | Lead / Sr. Java Engineer | On-Site | Amsterdam | â‚¬65K-85K

Jobsrepublic is a fast growing company in the digital recruitment space. We are one of the leading suppliers in recruitment software in the Netherlands and own a number of household brands. We currently grow fast with our award winning hyper targeted recruitment campaigns.

Currently looking for a Lead Java Engineer or Senior Java Engineer to join our team.

You will be responsible for designing and building the platform behind our campaign tracker. The campaign tracker helps our clients follow the success of their hyper targeted job marketing campaigns. The campaign tracker will become the backbone of the most rapidly growing part of our business and is crucial to our success. The tech stack you will help design should also double as the new platform for our existing SaaS products.

Our current stack is primarily Java, Spring, Hibernate, MySQL hosted on AWS with VueJS on the frontend. In additition to that we maintain a host of jobboards written in PHP.

We work with a team of 5 developers from an office in Amsterdam west near Rembrandtpark. Total company size is about 30 people, most of them in their twenties. We are cashflow positive, maintain a stable yearly growth >50%, have a flat hierarchy and a good work life balance.

I'm the CTO and you will be working directly with me. Contact me if you are interested through cto@jobsrepublic.nl

No visa support available at the moment and no recruiters please.
